title: Disabling Public Chat Channel Listing
body:
Hi all,

We’ve been watching behaviour in our publicly listed channels (eg. “Looking for Group”) for some time now, to get a better understanding of whether they are useful to players.  We’ve noticed that most of the time, these channels are not being used as originally intended - often for advertising services or spamming.

While we don’t want to remove anything for players who enjoy participating in these channels, we feel that we should not be directing new players there by listing the channels publicly.

With that in mind, we’ve disabled the public channel listings for “Strategy”, “Looking For Group”, “Noob”, “Public Chat”.

Please ask below if you have any questions.

Agent Mindstar
